article.title: Abati
article.paragraph: forthe village in IranAbati, IranAbatiis a surname. It was used by an ancient noble family ofFlorence.cite bookConcise Dictionary of Proper Names and Notable Matters in the Works of Dante1914Clarendon PressOxford1http://www.questia.com/read/5635460/concise-dictionary-of-proper-names-and-notable-mattersPaget Toynbee11 September 2013Subscription requiredQuestia

list.listitem: Baldo Angelo Abati(sixteenth century), Italian naturalist
